page.title: 10CUCKMANS FARM
page.content: The{farm}in Chiswell Green is called Cuckmans Farm. It has been here for roughly 1000 years and belongs to Mr. Pope. He does all the work by himself although he has about 300 acres. There used to be seven people working on the farm but now there is only Mr.Pope and a{Contract Labourer for when he needs the help. Mr.Pope used to grow peas and other vegetables but now he just grows barley and grain which is taken abroad. There aren't any animals on the farm but there used to be some sheep,chickens and turkeys. He also used to have a dairy herd but now he just has a few geese and two large dogs to give warning of intruders. The machines that Mr.Pope uses are nearly all attachments to his tractor but he also has a combine harvester which does the job of several men.
